ygData.msgSnippet: Sphink and his fellow bot cried out in shock... The ark is gone. How are we still here? It was reported that when the megatron first tried to destroy Megatron

Subject:  Destrons and Valtron's answer-grimmler

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

  Sphink and his fellow bot cried out in shock..."The ark is gone. How are we 
still here? It was reported that when the megatron first tried to destroy 
Megatron a great storm began to destroy the universe. But all I know is we 
must help it be rebuilt." He turned to his leader.. "shall we go?"
   Valtron heard the cry of help from Magnus. He flew straight torwards the 
ark's last known postition to him. He told grimmler to follow. He must see 
this for himself.
